programName: How to convert String to int
code: // How to convert String to int public class program1 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example String String strNumber = "123"; // Convert String to int using parseInt method try { int intValue = Integer.parseInt(strNumber); System.out.println("Converted int value: " + intValue); } catch (NumberFormatException e) { System.out.println("Error: The string is not a valid integer."); } } }

programName: How to convert int to String
code: // How to convert int to String public class program2 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example int int intValue = 123; // Convert int to String using String.valueOf() String strValue = String.valueOf(intValue); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted String value: " + strValue); } }

programName: How to convert String to long
code: // How to convert String to long public class program3 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example String String strNumber = "1234567890123"; try { // Convert String to long using Long.parseLong() long longValue = Long.parseLong(strNumber); System.out.println("Converted long value: " + longValue); } catch (NumberFormatException e) { System.out.println("Error: The string is not a valid long."); } } }

programName: How to convert long to String
code: // How to convert long to String public class program4 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example long long longValue = 1234567890123L; // Convert long to String using String.valueOf() String stringValue = String.valueOf(longValue); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted String value: " + stringValue); } }

programName: How to convert String to float
code: // How to convert String to float public class program5 { public static void main(String[] args) { String strNumber = "123.45"; try { // Convert String to float using Float.parseFloat() float floatValue = Float.parseFloat(strNumber); System.out.println("Converted float value: " + floatValue); } catch (NumberFormatException e) { System.out.println("Error: The string is not a valid float."); } } }

programName: How to convert float to String
code: // How to convert float to String public class program6 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example float float floatValue = 123.45f; // Convert float to String using String.valueOf() String stringValue = String.valueOf(floatValue); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted String value: " + stringValue); } }

programName: How to convert String to double
code: // How to convert String to double public class program7 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example String String strNumber = "123.45"; try { // Convert String to double using Double.parseDouble() double doubleValue = Double.parseDouble(strNumber); System.out.println("Converted double value: " + doubleValue); } catch (NumberFormatException e) { System.out.println("Error: The string is not a valid double."); } } }

programName: How to convert double to String
code: // How to convert double to String public class program8 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example double double doubleValue = 123.45; // Convert double to String using String.valueOf() String stringValue = String.valueOf(doubleValue); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted String value: " + stringValue); } }

programName: How to convert String to Date
code: // How to convert String to Date import java.text.ParseException; import java.text.SimpleDateFormat; import java.util.Date; public class program9 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example String representing a date String dateString = "2023-11-17"; // Define the date format pattern String dateFormatPattern = "yyyy-MM-dd"; try { // Create a SimpleDateFormat object with the specified pattern SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat(dateFormatPattern); // Parse the String to obtain a Date object Date dateValue = dateFormat.parse(dateString); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted Date value: " + dateValue); } catch (ParseException e) { System.out.println("Error: The string is not a valid date with the specified format."); e.printStackTrace(); } } }
output: Converted Date value: Fri Nov 17 00:00:00 IST 2023

programName: How to convert Date to String
code: // How to convert Date to String import java.text.SimpleDateFormat; import java.util.Date; public class program10{ public static void main(String[] args) { // Example Date Date currentDate = new Date(); // Define the date format pattern String dateFormatPattern = "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"; // Customize the pattern as needed // Create a SimpleDateFormat object with the specified pattern SimpleDateFormat dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat(dateFormatPattern); // Format the Date to obtain a String representation String dateString = dateFormat.format(currentDate); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted String value: " + dateString); } }

programName: How to convert String to char
code: // How to convert String to char public class program11 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example String String str = "Hello"; // Convert String to char // Access the first character in the String char firstChar = str.charAt(0); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted char value: " + firstChar); } }

programName: How to convert char to String
code: // How to convert char to String public class program12 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example char char myChar = 'A'; // Convert char to String using String.valueOf() String myString = String.valueOf(myChar); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted String value: " + myString); } }

programName: How to convert String to Object
code: // How to convert String to Object public class program13 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example String representing an integer String stringValue = "42"; // Convert String to Integer object try { Object myObject = Integer.valueOf(stringValue); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted Object value: " + myObject); } catch (NumberFormatException e) { System.out.println("Error: The string is not a valid representation of the object."); } } }

programName: How to convert Object to String
code: // How to convert Object to String public class program14 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example Object Object myObject = new CustomObject("Hello"); // Convert Object to String using toString() String stringValue = myObject.toString(); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted String value: " + stringValue); } } // CustomObject class with overridden toString() method class CustomObject { private String data; public CustomObject(String data) { this.data = data; } @Override public String toString() { return "CustomObject[data=" + data + "]"; } }

code: // How to convert long to int public class program16 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example long long longValue = 1234567890123L; // Convert long to int using explicit casting int intValue = (int) longValue; // Print the result System.out.println("Converted int value: " + intValue); } }

code: // How to convert double to int public class program18 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example double double doubleValue = 42.75; // Convert double to int using explicit casting int intValue = (int) doubleValue; // Print the result System.out.println("Converted int value: " + intValue); } }

programName: How to convert String to boolean
code: // How to convert String to boolean public class program21 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example String String boolString = "true"; // Convert String to boolean using Boolean.parseBoolean() boolean boolValue = Boolean.parseBoolean(boolString); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted boolean value: " + boolValue); } }

programName: How to convert boolean to String
code: // How to convert boolean to String public class program22 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example boolean boolean boolValue = true; // Convert boolean to String using String.valueOf() String stringValue = String.valueOf(boolValue); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted String value: " + stringValue); } }

programName: How to convert Date to Timestamp
code: // How to convert Date to Timestamp import java.sql.Timestamp; import java.util.Date; public class program23 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example Date Date date = new Date(); // Convert Date to Timestamp Timestamp timestamp = new Timestamp(date.getTime()); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted Timestamp value: " + timestamp); } }

programName: How to convert Timestamp to Date
code: // How to convert Timestamp to Date import java.sql.Timestamp; import java.util.Date; public class program24 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example Timestamp Timestamp timestamp = new Timestamp(System.currentTimeMillis()); // Convert Timestamp to Date using the Date constructor Date date = new Date(timestamp.getTime()); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted Date value: " + date); } }
output: Converted Date value: Fri Nov 17 18:48:45 IST 2023

programName: How to convert Binary to Decimal
code: // How to convert Binary to Decimal public class program25 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example binary number (as a String) String binaryNumber = "101010"; // Convert binary to decimal int decimalValue = binaryToDecimal(binaryNumber); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted decimal value: " + decimalValue); } // Method to convert binary to decimal private static int binaryToDecimal(String binary) { int decimalValue = 0; // Iterate over each bit in reverse order for (int i = binary.length() - 1, j = 0; i >= 0; i--, j++) { // Check if the bit is '1', add 2^j to the decimal value if (binary.charAt(i) == '1') { decimalValue += Math.pow(2, j); } } return decimalValue; } }

programName: How to convert Decimal to Binary
code: // How to convert Decimal to Binary public class DecimalToBinaryExample { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example decimal number int decimalNumber = 42; // Convert decimal to binary String binaryValue = decimalToBinary(decimalNumber); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted binary value: " + binaryValue); } // Method to convert decimal to binary private static String decimalToBinary(int decimal) { if (decimal == 0) { return "0"; } StringBuilder binary = new StringBuilder(); while (decimal > 0) { // Get the remainder when dividing by 2 int remainder = decimal % 2; // Prepend the remainder to the binary string binary.insert(0, remainder); // Divide the decimal number by 2 decimal = decimal / 2; } return binary.toString(); } }

programName: How to convert Hex to Decimal
code: // How to convert Hex to Decimal public class program27 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example hexadecimal number (as a String) String hexNumber = "1A"; // Convert hex to decimal int decimalValue = hexToDecimal(hexNumber); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted decimal value: " + decimalValue); } // Method to convert hex to decimal private static int hexToDecimal(String hex) { // Parse the hexadecimal string and convert to decimal return Integer.parseInt(hex, 16); } }

programName: How to convert Decimal to Hex
code: // How to convert Decimal to Hex public class program28 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example decimal number int decimalNumber = 42; // Convert decimal to hex String hexValue = decimalToHex(decimalNumber); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted hex value: " + hexValue); } // Method to convert decimal to hex private static String decimalToHex(int decimal) { // Convert decimal to hex using Integer.toHexString return Integer.toHexString(decimal); } }

programName: How to convert Octal to Decimal
code: // How to convert Octal to Decimal public class program29 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example octal number (as a String) String octalNumber = "52"; // Convert octal to decimal int decimalValue = octalToDecimal(octalNumber); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted decimal value: " + decimalValue); } // Method to convert octal to decimal private static int octalToDecimal(String octal) { // Parse the octal string and convert to decimal return Integer.parseInt(octal, 8); } }

programName: How to convert Decimal to Octal
code: // How to convert Decimal to Octal public class program30 { public static void main(String[] args) { // Example decimal number int decimalNumber = 42; // Convert decimal to octal String octalValue = decimalToOctal(decimalNumber); // Print the result System.out.println("Converted octal value: " + octalValue); } // Method to convert decimal to octal private static String decimalToOctal(int decimal) { // Convert decimal to octal using Integer.toOctalString return Integer.toOctalString(decimal); } }
